section.title: Introduction To The Gentoo/AMD64 Technical Notes

body.p: The Gentoo/AMD64 project has the goal of delivering a stable port of Gentoo to the Athlon64 and Opteron processor family. These technotes provide information about known issues and considerations when installing Gentoo on the AMD64 platform.

subsection.title: How To Use These Technical Notes

body.p: These technical notes are meant to be used during the installation and daily use of the AMD64 port of Gentoo. You should read these technical notes in their entirety before attempting to install Gentoo/AMD64.
